verses.verse: אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also לְ֭זֹאת <S%H2063><s%> At this יֶחֱרַ֣ד <S%H2729><s%> trembleth לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> also my heart וְ֝יִתַּ֗ר <S%H5425><s%> and is moved out מִמְּקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> of his place

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> attentively בְּרֹ֣גֶז <S%H7267><s%> the noise קֹל֑וֹ <S%H6963><s%> of his voice וְ֝הֶ֗גֶה <S%H1899><s%> and the sound מִפִּ֥יו <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> [that] goeth out תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner

הַשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> under the whole heaven יִשְׁרֵ֑הוּ <S%H3474><s%> He directeth וְ֝אוֹר֗וֹ <S%H216><s%> and his lightning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto כַּנְפ֥וֹת <S%H3671><s%> unto the ends הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

אַחֲרָ֤יו ׀ <S%H310><s%> After יִשְׁאַג־ <S%H7580><s%> roareth ק֗וֹל <S%H6963><s%> it a voice יַ֭רְעֵם <S%H7481><s%> he thundereth בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> with the voice גְּאוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H1347><s%> of his excellency וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יְ֝עַקְּבֵ֗ם <S%H6117><s%> and he will not stay כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> is heard קוֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> them when his voice

יַרְעֵ֤ם <S%H7481><s%> thundereth אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God בְּ֭קוֹלוֹ <S%H6963><s%> with his voice נִפְלָא֑וֹת <S%H6381><s%> marvellously עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> doeth גְ֝דֹל֗וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great things וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot נֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> he which we cannot comprehend

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For לַשֶּׁ֨לַג ׀ <S%H7950><s%> to the snow יֹאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> For he saith הֱוֵ֫א <S%H1933><s%> Be thou אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [on] the earth וְגֶ֥שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain מָטָ֑ר <S%H4306><s%> likewise to the small וְ֝גֶ֗שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain מִטְר֥וֹת <S%H4306><s%> and to the great עֻזּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5797><s%> of his strength בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> able כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner
אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> of every man יַחְתּ֑וֹם <S%H2856><s%> He sealeth up לָ֝דַ֗עַת <S%H3045><s%> may know כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> men מַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <S%H4639><s%> his work

וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> go חַיָּ֣ה <S%H2416><s%> Then the beasts בְמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> into אָ֑רֶב <S%H695><s%> dens וּבִמְע֖וֹנֹתֶ֣יהָ <S%H4585><s%> in their places תִשְׁכֹּֽן׃ <S%H7931><s%> and remain

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Out הַ֭חֶדֶר <S%H2315><s%> Out of the south תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh סוּפָ֑ה <S%H5492><s%> the whirlwind וּֽמִמְּזָרִ֥ים <S%H4215><s%> out of the north קָרָֽה׃ <S%H7135><s%> and cold

מִנִּשְׁמַת־ <S%H5397><s%> By the breath אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> of God יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> is given קָ֑רַח <S%H7140><s%> frost וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the waters בְּמוּצָֽק׃ <S%H4164><s%> is straitened

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Also בְּ֭רִי <S%H7377><s%> Also by watering יַטְרִ֣יחַ <S%H2959><s%> he wearieth עָ֑ב <S%H5645><s%> the thick cloud יָ֝פִ֗יץ <S%H6327><s%> he scattereth עֲנַ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> cloud אוֹרֽוֹ׃ <S%H216><s%> his bright

וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> It מְסִבּ֨וֹת ׀ <S%H4524><s%> round about מִתְהַפֵּ֣ךְ <S%H2015><s%> And it is turned [בְּתַחְבּוּלָתֹו כ] (בְּתַחְבּוּלֹתָ֣יו <S%H8458><s%> fornication ק) לְפָעֳלָ֑ם <S%H6467><s%> that they may do כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he יְצַוֵּ֓ם ׀ <S%H6680><s%> whatsoever he commandeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> On פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> them upon the face תֵבֵ֣ל <S%H8398><s%> of the world אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Whether לְשֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> whether for correction אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> or for his land אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or לְ֝חֶ֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> or for mercy יַמְצִאֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> He causeth it to come

הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <S%H238><s%> Hearken זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> O אִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> unto this O Job עֲ֝מֹ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> stand still וְהִתְבּוֹנֵ֤ן ׀ <S%H995><s%> and consider נִפְלְא֬וֹת <S%H6381><s%> the wondrous אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> works of God

הֲ֭תֵדַע <S%H3045><s%> Dost thou know בְּשׂוּם־ <S%H7760><s%> disposed אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> when God עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> unto וְ֝הוֹפִ֗יעַ <S%H3313><s%> to shine א֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> them and caused the light עֲנָנֽוֹ׃ <S%H6051><s%> of his cloud

הֲ֭תֵדַע <S%H3045><s%> Dost thou know עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about מִפְלְשֵׂי־ <S%H4657><s%> the balancings עָ֑ב <S%H5645><s%> of the clouds מִ֝פְלְא֗וֹת <S%H4652><s%> the wondrous works תְּמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> of him which is perfect דֵּעִֽים׃ <S%H1843><s%> knowledge

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose בְּגָדֶ֥יךָ <S%H899><s%> How thy garments חַמִּ֑ים <S%H2525><s%> [are] warm בְּהַשְׁקִ֥ט <S%H8252><s%> when he quieteth אֶ֝֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth מִדָּרֽוֹם׃ <S%H1864><s%> by the south

תַּרְקִ֣יעַ <S%H7554><s%> Hast thou with him spread out עִ֭מּוֹ <S%H5973><s%> out לִשְׁחָקִ֑ים <S%H7834><s%> the sky חֲ֝זָקִ֗ים <S%H2389><s%> [which is] strong כִּרְאִ֥י <S%H7209><s%> looking glass מוּצָֽק׃ <S%H3332><s%> [and] as a molten

ה֭וֹדִיעֵנוּ <S%H3045><s%> Teach מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what נֹּ֣אמַר <S%H559><s%> us what we shall say ל֑וֹ לֹ֥א־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot נַ֝עֲרֹ֗ךְ <S%H6186><s%> unto him [for] we cannot order מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> [our speech] by reason חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness

הַֽיְסֻפַּר־ <S%H5608><s%> Shall it be told ל֭וֹ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> him that I speak אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אָ֥מַר <S%H559><s%> speak אִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ? if a man כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יְבֻלָּֽע׃ <S%H1104><s%> surely he shall be swallowed up

וְעַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> Now לֹ֘א <S%H3808><s%> not רָ֤אוּ <S%H7200><s%> And now [men] see א֗וֹר <S%H216><s%> light בָּהִ֣יר <S%H925><s%> not the bright ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> which בַּשְּׁחָקִ֑ים <S%H7834><s%> which [is] in the clouds וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> but the wind עָ֝בְרָ֗ה <S%H5674><s%> passeth וַֽתְּטַהֲרֵֽם׃ <S%H2891><s%> and cleanseth

מִ֭צָּפוֹן <S%H6828><s%> out of the north זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> Fair weather יֶֽאֱתֶ֑ה <S%H857><s%> cometh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Around אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> with God נ֣וֹרָא <S%H3372><s%> [is] terrible הֽוֹד׃ <S%H1935><s%> majesty

שַׁדַּ֣י <S%H7706><s%> [Touching] the Almighty לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מְ֭צָאנֻהוּ <S%H4672><s%> we cannot find him out שַׂגִּיא־ <S%H7689><s%> [he is] excellent כֹ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> in power וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> and in judgment וְרֹב־ <S%H7230><s%> and in plenty צְ֝דָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> of justice לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and He will not יְעַנֶּֽה׃ <S%H6031><s%> he will not afflict

לָ֭כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יְרֵא֣וּהוּ <S%H3372><s%> do therefore fear אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> Men לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִ֝רְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> him he respecteth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any חַכְמֵי־ <S%H2450><s%> not any [that are] wise לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of heart פ
